title: sabre dav client fails to open remote lighttp dav folder (owncloud 4.5.2)
body:
hi,

since a few days i try to mount a remote webdav/lighttpd drive. after a succesful mount, the folder structure as well as files are only visible in parts. creating a file results in a visible file, but it is not created on the remote drive. additionaly the root folder "cloud" is tried to open twice. 
a look at source code reveals, that the first returned entry is set as current folder. maybe webdav/lighttp does not return it in that manner?

owncloud.log
error	 webdav client	 http error response. (errorcode 400)
error	 webdav client	 resource https://xx.xxx.xx/cloud/cloud not found.

php_error.log
php notice:  undefined offset: 200 in /xxx/docs/3rdparty/sabre/dav/client.php on line 152
php notice:  trying to get property of non-object in /xxx/docs/apps/files_external/lib/webdav.php on line 106
php notice:  undefined offset: 200 in /xxx/docs/3rdparty/sabre/dav/client.php on line 146
php notice:  trying to get property of non-object in /xxx/docs/apps/files_external/lib/webdav.php on line 278
resource https://xx.xxx.xx/cloud/cloud not found.
http error response. (errorcode 400)

i also tried the complete master branch, master branch for sabre and apps/files_external/lib/webdav.php, and got different warning messages but it never worked.

i tested my webdav/lighttp with litmus-0.13, with 2 minor errors:
http://pastebin.com/ayek2rb7
